caption: Relating to provision to the Texas Department of Transportation of information regarding certain high-speed rail projects.
authors: Harris, Orr, Metcalf, Morales, Eddie, Harris Davila
last_action: 04/16/2025 H Committee report sent to Calendars
summary: This is a procedural document showing that HB 2003 was recalled from subcommittee, had a public hearing with testimony, was left pending, and later reported favorably without amendments. The actual content and impact of the bill cannot be determined from this document.
translation: 这是一份程序性文件，显示HB 2003从小组委员会被召回，进行了公开听证和证词记录，暂时搁置，随后未经修正获得通过。从该文件无法确定该法案的具体内容和影响。
committees: Without the actual bill text, I cannot determine which committees would be most appropriate. The document only shows committee actions but not the subject matter.
category: Irrelevant - Cannot determine from this procedural document alone as it contains no information about the bill's content or its impact on any immigrant groups.
